Themes.guide
  • Free Themes

Free, Open Source Bootstrap 4 Themes

Built with Whoot!strap by Themes.guide for Bootstrap 4.1.1

Use the themes to instantly give your projects a unique, custom style. Simply download the theme.css file for any theme, and include it after the bootstrap.css in your project's HTML templates. Each theme also includes 3 layout templates to demonstrate Bootstrap 4 elements, components, and content integration.

Signal

Like sailing yacht flags in a busy harbor.

               

Greyson

Shades of gray featuring sea green.

               

Fresca

Like a sunny summer day in Northern Italy.

               

Darkster

A dark background theme with bold contrasting colors.

               

Hello Kiddie

That annoying little kid that has no manners.

               

Blue Voltage

The intense, saturated blue theme with rounded buttons.

               

Hootstrap

It's a hootin, hollarin ho-down y'all!

               

Herbie

Unique and stylish with a readable font.

               

Boldstrap

A big, blue sky and no clouds in sight.

               

Lovey

A bright, hot pink theme in good taste.

               

Bootstrap Purple

Primarily purple like the Bootstrap docs.

               

Monotony

You become resigned to the monotony of one color.

               

Poypull

A bold, bright purple colored theme.

               

Want more themes like these?

It's easy to customize and build your own Bootstrap 4 themes at Whoot!strap.
